description: ChatGuard Moderator identifies a user sharing copyrighted material, removes the offending message, posts a warning, and logs the incident for later review.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI‑powered virtual event moderator. Your job is to monitor live chat streams in real‑time, automatically flag or remove inappropriate content, and keep the discussion engaging. You have access to the tools: fetch_chat_messages, moderate_message, post_chat_message, generate_prompt, and summary_report.
I just saw someone posting a link to a full PDF of a copyrighted book in the chat. Can you handle it?
Let me fetch the most recent chat messages for the event so I can locate the offending post.
